review.title: “A company that cares for there customers as friends not adversary's.”
review.pros: Pros – Open minded staff that believes that it is never wrong to do the right thing.A real feeling of you belong and contribute to the company.Always looking to grow but not at the cost of the product they sell.Gives credit where credit is due. No glory hounds here.Believes family comes first.Great place to learn new things.
review.cons: Cons – Benefit options are poor and costly due to the fact that all employees are managed through a payroll company.Its a small company so room for advancement is slow.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – If you could shop that payroll company to see if better benefits could be found.
